abstract: Deutsche Bank and JPMorgan Chase have found buyers for the highest yielding loans financing Kohlberg Kravis Roberts‘ purchase of the British pharmacist Alliance Boots in a sign demand for credit may be improving.
lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank and JPMorgan Chase have found buyers for the highest yielding loans financing Kohlberg Kravis Roberts‘ purchase of the British pharmacist Alliance Boots in a sign demand for credit may be improving.

headline.main: Banks Said to Find Buyers for Boots Debt
